entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Wind becoming north 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
